WRITING.TITLE: How did everyone feel about Fist Fight?
WRITING.TEXT:
After reading a couple of reviews and seeing it's 37 on Metacritic, I was happy with this movie after watching it. I laughed throughout, and enjoyed the entire movie. I would never say it's anywhere near perfect or even particularly great, but I was happy to have a nice short comedy that didn't take itself seriously unnecessarily. I was mainly just happy there wasn't any unneeded plots or big moral lessons shoved in. The fight scene was also fucking awesome, best comedy fight I've seen since the fight in Pineapple Express between Rogen, Franco, and McBride. All in all I'd give the movie probably a 7/10, which is honestly better than the majority of comedies I saw last year.
What did everyone else think though?
Or how everything is a store. The Hamburger Store, the Welfare Store, etc. It's the little things like this that make it such a legendary show.
